feat.name: Boon of Bloodshed
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Killer's Fortune
entries: When an enemy you can see is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, you gain {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the next attack roll you make before the end of your next turn.

entries.name: Power from Pain
entries: Once per turn, when you make an attack roll while {@status Bloodied|XPHB}, you can deal extra damage to the target equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}. The extra damage's type is the same as the attack's type.

feat.name: Boon of Bountiful Health
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Augmented Health
entries: When you gain {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}, increase the number of {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} you gain by 5.

entries.name: Superior Recuperation
entries: When you spend one or more {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB} to regain {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, you can instead use the highest number possible for each die.

feat.name: Boon of Communication
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Cunning Speaker
entries: You don't have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on ability checks to influence {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} creatures.

entries.name: Gifted Interpreter
entries: You understand the literal meaning of any language you hear or see signed, and you can understand the literal meaning of any written language you see.

entries.name: Mental Communication
entries: You gain telepathy with a range of 120 feet.

feat.name: Boon of Desperate Resilience
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Defense of Body and Mind
entries: While you are {@status Bloodied|XPHB}, you have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to every damage type except Force.

feat.name: Boon of Exquisite Radiance
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Eternal Rest
entries: Creatures you reduce to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} can't become Undead.

entries.name: Powerful Radiance
entries: When you make a damage roll that deals Radiant damage, you can instead use the highest number possible for each damage die. Once you use this benefit, you can't do so again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Boon of Fluid Forms
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Shapechanger
entries: You can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to shape-shift into a Beast, Humanoid, or Monstrosity with a {@variantrule Challenge Rating|XPHB} no higher than 10. When you shape-shift, you gain a number of {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} equal to the {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} of the form. The shape-shifting effect lasts for 1 hour, and it ends early if you have no {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} left or if you take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to return to your true form.

Your game statistics are replaced by the stat block of the chosen form, but you retain your creature type; alignment; personality; Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores; {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}; {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB}; proficiencies; and ability to communicate. If you have the Spellcasting or Pact Magic feature, you retain it too. Upon shape-shifting, you determine whether your equipment drops to the ground or changes in size and shape to fit the new form while you're in it.
Once you use this benefit, you can't do so again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

entries.name: Hardy Transformation
entries: When you gain {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} when you shape-shift, increase that number of {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} by 20.

feat.name: Boon of Fortune's Favor
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Saving Throw Reroll
entries: When you fail a saving throw, you can reroll it and must use the new roll. Once you use this benefit, you can't do so again until the start of your next turn.

feat.name: Boon of Poison Mastery
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Antitoxic
entries: You have {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Poison damage and the {@condition Poisoned|XPHB} condition.

entries.name: Perfect Poisoner
entries: Once per turn, when you roll dice to determine Poison damage a creature takes from your attack, spell, or feature, you can instead use the highest number possible for each die.

feat.name: Boon of Revelry
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Inspire Dance
entries: You always have the {@spell Otto's Irresistible Dance|XPHB} spell prepared. You can cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it that way when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level.
When you cast the spell, it requires no spell components, and taking damage doesn't break your {@status Concentration|XPHB} on it.

entries.name: Sing Out
entries: While a creature that failed its saving throw against your {@spell Otto's Irresistible Dance|XPHB} has the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} condition from that spell, it can't cast spells with Verbal components, and it sings delightful nonsense if it can sing.

feat.name: Boon of Terror
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Fearless
entries: You have {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition.

entries.name: Flee, Fools!
entries: When a creature with the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition starts its turn within 60 feet of you, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to stoke its terror, provided you can see the creature and it isn't behind {@variantrule Cover|XPHB|Total Cover}. If you do so, the creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC 8 plus your Charisma modifier and your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}) or spend its turn moving away from you by the fastest available means. Once you use this benefit, you can't use it again until you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

entries.name: Intimidating
entries: You gain {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB} in the {@skill Intimidation|XPHB} skill if you don't already have it. You also gain {@variantrule Expertise|XPHB} in {@skill Intimidation|XPHB}.

feat.name: Boon of the Bright Sun
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Daylight Presence
entries: As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, you radiate a 30-foot {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} of {@variantrule Bright Light|XPHB} that is sunlight. If any of the {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation}'s area overlaps with an area of {@spell Darkness|XPHB} created by a spell, that spell is dispelled. The {@variantrule Emanation [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Emanation} lasts until you dismiss it (no action required), die, or have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

entries.name: Fortifying Light
entries: When your Daylight Presence is active, at the start of each of your turns, you and allies you can see in your Daylight Presence gain 10 {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB}.

feat.name: Boon of the Furious Storm
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Eye of the Storm
entries: You have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Lightning and Thunder damage. While you are {@status Bloodied|XPHB}, you have {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Lightning and Thunder damage.

entries.name: Storm's Strength
entries: Creatures have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on saving throws against your spells that deal Lightning or Thunder damage.

feat.name: Boon of the Soul Drinker
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Grave Resistance
entries: You have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Cold damage and Necrotic damage.

entries.name: Siphon Life
entries: When an enemy within 120 feet of you is reduced to 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to regain 50 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB}. Once you use this benefit, you can't use it again until you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Cold Caster
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Cantrip
entries: You learn the {@spell Ray of Frost|XPHB} cantrip. If you already know it, you learn a different Wizard cantrip of your choice. The spell's spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat.

entries.name: Frostbite
entries: Once per turn when you hit a creature with an attack roll and deal Cold damage, you can temporarily negate the creature's defenses. The creature subtracts {@dice 1d4} from the next saving throw it makes before the end of your next turn.

feat.name: Cult of the Dragon Initiate
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Dragon's Tongue
entries: You know Draconic. If you already know Draconic when you select this feat, you instead learn one language of your choice from the language tables in the Player's Handbook or Chapter 2 of this book.

entries.name: Dragon's Terror
entries: You can take a {@action Magic|XPHB} action to instill terror in a creature you can see within 30 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC 8 plus your Wisdom modifier and {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}) or have the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition until the end of your next turn. If the target succeeds on the save or when the effect ends for a target, the target is immune to this effect for 24 hours.

entries.name: Inspired by Fear
entries: When you cause a creature to have the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition and you are the source of its fear, you can gain {@variantrule Heroic Inspiration|XPHB} if you lack it. Once you use this benefit, you can't use it again until you finish a {@variantrule Short Rest|XPHB|Short} or {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Dragonscarred
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Damage Resistance
entries: When you gain this feat, choose Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning, or Poison. You have {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to the chosen damage type.

entries.name: Fearsome Power
entries: When you deal damage to a creature as part of the Attack or Magic action on your turn, you can use the Dragon's Terror benefit of the Cult of the Dragon Initiate feat as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} this turn.

feat.name: Emerald Enclave Fledgling
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Speak with Animals
entries: You always have the {@spell Speak with Animals|XPHB} spell prepared and can cast it with any spell slots you have. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell (choose when you select this feat). When you cast this spell as a {@variantrule Ritual|XPHB}, its duration is 8 hours.

entries.name: Tag Team
entries: When you take the {@action Help|XPHB} action, you can switch places with a willing ally within 5 feet of yourself as part of that same action. This movement doesn't provoke {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB|Opportunity Attacks}. You can't use this benefit if the ally has the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

feat.name: Enclave Magic
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Friend to Animals
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on ability checks when taking the {@action Influence|XPHB} action with Beasts.

entries.name: Two Hearts, One Mind
entries: You always have the {@spell Beast Sense|XPHB} spell prepared. You can cast it once without a spell slot, and you regain the ability to cast it in that way when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. When you cast it without a spell slot using this feature, it doesn't require {@status Concentration|XPHB}. You can also cast the spell using any spell slots you have of the appropriate level. The spell's spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat.

feat.name: Fairy Trickster
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Faerie Trod Trotter
entries: When you take the {@action Disengage|XPHB} action on your turn, {@variantrule Difficult Terrain|XPHB} doesn't cost you extra movement for the rest of that turn.

entries.name: Flustering Strike
entries: When you hit a creature with an attack roll, you can attempt to fluster the target. The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw (DC 8 plus the ability modifier of the score increased by this feat and your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}) or have {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on saving throws until the end of your next turn.
You can use this benefit a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Genie Magic
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Wish Magic
entries: As a {@action Magic|XPHB} action, you can cast a {@filter level 1 spell of your choice from the Sorcerer spell list|spells|level=1|class=Sorcerer} that has a casting time of an action. Once you use this benefit, you can't do so again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}. The spell's spellcasting ability is the ability increased by this feat.
When you reach level 11, the spell you cast with this feat is cast as though using a level 2 spell slot.
When you reach level 17, the spell is cast as though using a level 3 spell slot.

feat.name: Harper Agent
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Thieves' Cant
entries: You know Thieves' Cant.

entries.name: Instrument Training
entries: You gain proficiency with a {@item Musical Instrument|XPHB} of your choice.

entries.name: Distracting Melody
entries: When you take the {@action Help|XPHB} action to assist an ally's attack roll, the enemy you're distracting can be within 30 feet of you, rather than within 5 feet of you, provided the enemy can see or hear you.

feat.name: Harper Teamwork
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Withering Wordplay
entries: When you take the {@action Help|XPHB} action to assist an ally's attack roll against an enemy, that enemy also has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on the first saving throw it makes before the start of your next turn.

entries.name: Inspiring Willpower
entries: If you succeed on a saving throw to end the {@condition Frightened|XPHB} or {@condition Paralyzed|XPHB} condition on yourself, you can choose one ally you can see within 30 feet of yourself that has the same condition. That condition immediately ends for that ally.

feat.name: Lordly Resolve
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Standard Bearer
entries: As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, choose up to three creatures within 60 feet of yourself that can see you. Each target can immediately take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to right itself and end the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition, provided its {@variantrule Speed|XPHB} isn't 0. Additionally, you bolster the targets' resolve, which lasts for 1 minute or until you have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition. While bolstered, a target can't be possessed or gain the {@condition Charmed|XPHB} or {@condition Frightened|XPHB} condition; if a target is already possessed, {@condition Charmed|XPHB}, or {@condition Frightened|XPHB}, the target has {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on any new saving throw against the relevant effect.
Once you use this benefit, you can't do so again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Lords' Alliance Agent
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Inspiring Strike
entries: Once per turn when you score a {@variantrule Critical Hit|XPHB} against a creature, you can choose an ally within 30 feet of yourself who can see or hear you and who lacks {@variantrule Heroic Inspiration|XPHB}. That ally gains {@variantrule Heroic Inspiration|XPHB}.

entries.name: Reassert Honor
entries: When an enemy you can see deals damage to an ally of yours that is within 5 feet of you, you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on your next attack roll against that enemy before the end of your next turn.

entries.name: Mythal Ward
entries: If a spell attack hits you or you fail a saving throw against a spell, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to roll on the Mythal-Touched {@action Magic|XPHB} table to create a magical effect. If an effect requires a saving throw, the DC equals 8 plus the modifier of the ability increased by this feat and your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}.
You can use this benefit a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

entries.caption: Mythal-Touched Magic
rows: You and each creature within 15 feet of you make a Dexterity saving throw, taking Force damage equal to {@dice 1d8} times the level of the triggering spell on a failed save or half as much damage on a successful one.
You and the triggering spell's caster form a telepathic link for 1 hour.
Gravity is reversed in a 15-foot-radius, 60-foot-tall {@variantrule Cylinder [Area of Effect]|XPHB|Cylinder} centered on you for 1 minute, per the {@spell Reverse Gravity|XPHB} spell.
You and the triggering spell's caster each make a Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature has the {@condition Stunned|XPHB} condition until the end of its next turn.
You gain a +2 bonus to AC for 1 minute, potentially turning the triggering spell into a miss if it was a spell attack.

Any flammable, nonmagical object within 10 feet of the triggering spell's caster that isn't being worn or carried by another creature bursts into flame, takes {@damage 1d4} Fire damage, and is burning.

The triggering spell dissipates with no effect, and the action, {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, or {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} used to cast it is wasted. If that spell was cast with a spell slot, the slot isn't expended.

feat.name: Order's Resilience
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Resurge
entries: When you have the {@condition Prone|XPHB} condition, you can right yourself with only 5 feet of movement.

entries.name: Stronger Together
entries: If you are within 5 feet of an ally that doesn't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition, you and that ally have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Strength saving throws. You can't use this benefit while you have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

entries.name: Encourage Ally
entries: As a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB}, you bolster one ally you can see within 30 feet. The ally gains {@variantrule Temporary Hit Points|XPHB} equal to {@dice 2d6} plus the modifier of the ability score increased by this feat. You can take this {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

entries.name: Last Stand
entries: You have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls while {@status Bloodied|XPHB}.

feat.name: Purple Dragon Rook
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Entreat
entries: You gain proficiency in one of the following skills: {@skill Insight|XPHB}, {@skill Performance|XPHB}, or {@skill Persuasion|XPHB}.

entries.name: Rallying Cry
entries: When you roll {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} and don't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition, you can choose a number of creatures equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus} that you can see within 30 feet of yourself. Those creatures gain {@variantrule Heroic Inspiration|XPHB}.
Once you use this benefit, you can't do so again until you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Spellfire Adept
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Fueled Spellfire
entries: Once per turn, when a spell you cast deals Radiant damage, you can expend up to two {@variantrule Hit Point Dice|XPHB}, roll them, and add the total rolled to one damage roll of the spell.

entries.name: Searing Spellfire
entries: When you make a damage roll that deals Radiant damage, it ignores {@variantrule Resistance|XPHB} to Radiant damage.

feat.name: Spellfire Spark
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Magic Absorption
entries: Once per turn, when you take damage from a spell or magical effect, you reduce the total damage taken by {@dice 1d4}. You can't use this benefit if you have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

entries.name: Spellfire Flame
entries: You learn the {@spell Sacred Flame|XPHB} cantrip. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Charisma is your spellcasting ability for this spell (choose when you select this feat). You can also cast this cantrip as a {@variantrule Bonus Action|XPHB} a number of times equal to your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}, and you regain all expended uses when you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.

feat.name: Street Justice
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Headlock
entries: Your allies have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on attack rolls against a creature {@condition Grappled|XPHB} by you.

entries.name: Sturdy Knot
entries: When you use {@item Chain|XPHB}, {@item Manacles|XPHB}, or {@item Rope|XPHB} to bind a creature, add your {@variantrule Proficiency|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus} to the DC to escape or burst the {@item Chain|XPHB}, {@item Manacles|XPHB}, or {@item Rope|XPHB}.

entries.name: Tough Talk
entries: A creature's {@variantrule Hostile [Attitude]|XPHB|Hostile} attitude doesn't impose {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on your Charisma ({@skill Intimidation|XPHB}) checks to influence that creature.

feat.name: Tyro of the Gauntlet
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Stand as One
entries: When an ally within 5 feet of you is subjected to an effect that would push or pull it, you can take a {@variantrule Reaction|XPHB} to prevent that ally from being pushed or pulled. To receive this benefit, the ally can't have the {@condition Incapacitated|XPHB} condition.

entries.name: Vigilant
entries: When you take the {@action Ready|XPHB} action, the next attack roll made against you has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} before the start of your next turn.

feat.name: Zhentarim Ruffian
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Exploit Opening
entries: When you roll damage for an {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB}, you can roll the damage dice twice and use either roll against the target.

entries.name: Family First
entries: If you have {@variantrule Heroic Inspiration|XPHB} when you roll {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB}, you can expend it to give yourself and your allies {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on that {@variantrule Initiative|XPHB} roll.

feat.name: Zhentarim Tactics
entries: You gain the following benefits.

entries.name: Retaliate
entries: Immediately after a creature within 5 feet of you hits you with a melee attack, you can make an {@action Opportunity Attack|XPHB} against that creature.

entries.name: Versatile Merc
entries: When you finish a {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}, choose a skill in which you have proficiency. You have {@variantrule Expertise|XPHB} in that skill until you finish your next {@variantrule Long Rest|XPHB}.
